Title: Singapore’s LNG bunker sales rebound in March, lifting first-quarter 2025 volumes
Description: Singapore’s LNG bunker fuel sales recovered in March after two consecutive months of decline, helping to lift first-quarter 2025 volumes compared to a year earlier.
Author: CK

Title: Adnoc signs binding 15-year  LNG term supply deal with ENN as Chinese offtake grows
Description: Abu Dhabi’s state-owned energy firm Adnoc has signed a 15-year binding LNG supply deal with China’s ENN, finalising the preliminary agreement signed for 1 mtpa of LNG from the planned 9.6 mtpa Ruwais LNG plant.
Author: CK

Title: Golden Pass LNG start expected mid-2026, US Energy Secretary says
Description: US Energy Secretary Chris Wright has said the 18 mtpa Golden Pass LNG export project, a joint venture between QatarEnergy and ExxonMobil, is expected to begin shipments in mid-2026, providing some clarity on the project’s start of exports.
Author: CK

Title: Petronas confirms production disruption at Bintulu LNG facility, startup activities underway
Description: Malaysia’s state-owned energy company Petronas has confirmed a production disruption at its 29.3 mtpa Bintulu LNG complex, with rectification and start-up activities now underway.
Author: CK

Title: BP’s Greater Tortue Ahmeyim FLNG project ships first LNG cargo,  possibly to Asia
Description: The BP-led 2.5 mtpa Greater Tortue Ahmeyim floating LNG facility between Mauritania and Senegal has shipped its first cargo, marking the start of LNG exports from the project and the two countries.
Author: CK
